attributes.action: Increase Incapacity Benefit / Job Seekers Allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government says we need this low set amount to live on. So why do they live on 1000times more then us. Even though we may be out of work for what ever reason, we still have the right to live decently, but they take this away from us. They wil pay our rent to private landlords, but we could buy a house cheaper, Surey they should help us to do this, we wont be out of work for ever. sign this petition to help.
